alert.note: Alert for Adjuntas; Ciales; Jayuya; Morovis; Orocovis; Utuado (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 19 at 4:37PM ADT until September 19 at 9:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Adjuntas County in Puerto Rico... Ciales County in Puerto Rico... Jayuya County in Puerto Rico... Morovis County in Puerto Rico... Orocovis County in Puerto Rico... Utuado County in Puerto Rico... * Until 800 PM AST. * At 337 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain moving once again across the warned area. This rainfall in addition to previos rains will result in flash flooding, mudslides and rockfalls. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 5 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Adjuntas; Ciales; Jayuya; Morovis; Orocovis; Utuado
